channel.title: Spirit Led Ministries
channel.description: Recent content on Spirit Led Ministries

item.title: Abraham and Sarah
item.description: It is my hope that you will find it helpful in your calling to serve our Lord and Savior, Jesus Christ. I am writing this as a guide for those couples that are in a ministry. The story of Abram and Sarai is the story of two people in a ministry that birthed a nation under the One True GOD.
